content.rendered:
Diehl Metering presented TTE Products & Solutions with an ‘Outstanding Performance of the Year 2023’ award during a special evening hosted by Group CEO, Easa Al Gurg recently. They were represented by Dr. Dr. Christof Bosbach – CEO, Annette Geuther – CSO, Jean-Claude Luttringer – COO, Members of the Division Board, Dr. Christoph Sosna – SVP Strategic Business Unit Metering & Connectivity, Jairo Rojas – VP Sales Middle East, Africa and Turkey and Maya Ayoub – Regional Sales & Business Development Manager. Dilip Sharma – EVP, Roshan Samuel – VP and Syed Raza – Senior Sales Manager from TTE were also present on the occasion.

Diehl Metering is a worldwide leader in the design, manufacture and supply of smart metering solutions. Their solutions offer data-driven insights, IoT connectivity, fully flexible software, and seamless intelligent metering. The award is a testament to our collaborative partnership. Here’s to many more milestones and shared successes ahead!
